cf.Variable.ndim¶

Variable.ndim¶

The number of dimensions in the data array.

See also

data, hasdata, isscalar, shape

Examples: 
>>> f.hasdata
True
>>> f.shape
(73, 96)
>>> f.ndim
2

>>> f.shape
()
>>> f.ndim
0
